metadata.title: NyaaCat Gaming Community
metadata.description: NyaaCat is an open and diverse gaming community that operates multiple game servers.

hero.title: NyaaCat Gaming Community
hero.subtitle: An open and diverse gaming community

about.title: About Us
about.intro: NyaaCat evolved from a Minecraft player community into an open and diverse gaming community.
about.description: The community is driven by passion, operates entirely non-profit, and has no paid features. Here, people with the same interests come together to share the joy of gaming.

servers.title: Game Servers
servers.subtitle: We operate multiple game servers, welcome to join

nyaacat.name: NyaaCat
nyaacat.description: A persistent main world with mixed game modes. This is the universal game world for building the NyaaCat continent.

kedama.name: Kedama Craft
kedama.description: Simple, reliable, minimally restricted vanilla survival experience. No whitelist required, join directly with a legitimate account.

terraria.name: Terraria Meow
terraria.description: Community Terraria server offering both progression and casual gameplay experiences.

ror2.name: Rain of Death 2.1
ror2.description: Community Risk of Rain 2 multiplayer server with classic and endless modes.

more.name: More Games
more.description: Player-organized multiplayer events including Don't Starve Together, Valheim, and more. Follow community groups for details.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in touch with us through the following channels
